pages.text: Is there anything cozier than sitting by your homemade fireplace on a rainy evening, sipping a cup of tea?$(br)Surely: killing a boss beforehand.$(br)This tea, brewed from the petals of $(l:resources/jade_vines)Jade Vines$(/l) is both good for relaxing and protecting you from the deadly effect of the Wither. $(italic)Convenient$().
